title: Network (LAN / Internet) Issues
description: Troubleshooting wired network and internet connectivity.

steps.title: Cable Check
steps.instruction: Check the LAN cable connection at both ends. Try a different LAN port if available.

steps.title: System Restart
steps.instruction: Restart your system and check the network icon for status.

steps.title: Cross-Device Test
steps.instruction: Test another device on the same connection to rule out device-specific issues.

steps.title: Verification
steps.instruction: If the network is down for many users or the issue persists, raise an IT ticket. Do not tamper with network equipment.
